text: Spahija is a Kosovo Albanian surname of Persian origin derived from the word spahi (سپاهی, sepâhi; horseman, soldier), that entered Albanian from the Turkish adaption Sipahi (horseman, cavalryman). Notable people with the surname include: *Hrvoje Spahija (born 1988), Croatian footballer *Neven Spahija (born 1962), Croatian basketball coach ==See also== *Spahia (surname) *Spahić *Sipahioğlu ==References== Category:Albanian-language surnames
title: Spahija
